content: p1 until last 2 sts k2 written instructions row 1 k2 p2 k4 p1 k2tog yo p1 k16 p1 k2tog yo p1 k4 p2 *k4 p1 until last 2 sts k2 row 2 k2 p2 k4 p1 yo ssk p1 k16 p1 yo ssk p1 k4 p2 *k4 p1 until last 2 sts k2 row 3 k2 p2 c4f p1 k2tog yo p1 c8f c8b p1 k2tog yo p1 c4b p2 *k4 p1 until last 2 sts k2 row 4 repeat row 2 row 5 repeat row 1 row 6 repeat row 2 row 7 k2 p2 c4f p1 k2tog yo p1 k 16 p1 k2tog yo p1 c4b p2 *k4 p1 until last 2 sts k2 row 8 repeat row 2 3 chart a 4 instructions for charted and written continued repeat 13 times for a total of 14 repeats * if you wish to make a longer or shorter legwarmer length each repetition of the chart adds approx 1 inch ankle cuff ribbing *set-up row for large size k1 k2tog p2 k2 p2 10 times k1 k2tog p2 *k2 p2 until the end of row 88 sts total proceed to row 2 of chart or written instruction charted instructions follow chart b repeating until end of round on each row chart b written instructions row 1 *k2 p2 until end of round row 2 *lt p2 k2 p2 repeat from * until end of round row 3 repeat row 1 row 4 *k2 p2 lt p2 repeat from *until end of round 5 instructions for charted and written continued repeat row 1 -4 4 more times for a total of 5 repeats bobble fold down top cuf of legwarmer line button up with buttonhole and sew into place right leg warmer boot cuff ribbing using 3 mm needles co 80 90 sts join in the round and pm to mark the beginning of your round using the magic loop method i divided sts 40 / 40 40 /50 between the two sides *k1 p1 until you reach 1 inch in length buttonhole setup at the beginning of the next round k1 p1 until the last 4 sts bobble next 3 sts p1 next round k1 p1 until the last st yo 3 times *p1 continue in *k1 p1 rounds until cuf measures 4 inches / 10 cm in total switch to 3 5 needles and follow the directions for body of legwarmers and ankle cuff as stated above for the left legwarmer lightly block both legwarmers and enjoy pattern copyright 2015 natalie raedwulf all rights reserved pattern is for personal non-commercial use only n raedwulf@gmail com www facebook com/wolfandfaunknits 6
